channel.title: Dragon claws special help needed asap

item.title: Dragon claws special help needed asap
item.dc:creator: @resident123 resident123
item.description:
@resident123 wrote:

Im trying to get dragon claw special working , im using black-pearl source and when i save and compile i get this error:

This is my code :

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAmount -= 25; //hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(13) + misc.random(voidmelee); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); dclawhit(); AttackingOn2.specGFX(77); }

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon claws special help needed asap
